3 PneumaticAirRequirement::PneumaticAirRequirement(const PistonType pistonType, const double cylinderDiameter,
4  const double cylinderStroke, const double pistonRodDiameter,
5  const double airPressure, const double cyclesPerMin)
6  : pistonType(pistonType), cylinderDiameter(cylinderDiameter), cylinderStroke(cylinderStroke),
7  pistonRodDiameter(pistonRodDiameter), airPressure(airPressure), cyclesPerMin(cyclesPerMin)
8 {
9  if (pistonType != PistonType::DoubleActing) {
10  throw std::runtime_error("You must have a DoubleActing piston type to use piston rod diameter");
11  }
12 }
13 
14 PneumaticAirRequirement::PneumaticAirRequirement(const PistonType pistonType, const double cylinderDiameter,
15  const double cylinderStroke, const double airPressure,
16  const double cyclesPerMin)
17  : pistonType(pistonType), cylinderDiameter(cylinderDiameter), cylinderStroke(cylinderStroke),
18  airPressure(airPressure), cyclesPerMin(cyclesPerMin)
19 {
20  if (pistonType != PistonType::SingleActing) {
21  throw std::runtime_error("You must have a SingleActing piston type if you do not use piston rod diameter");
22  }
23 }
24 
25 PneumaticAirRequirement::Output PneumaticAirRequirement::calculate() {
26  auto const volumeAirIntakeSingle = (0.785 * std::pow(cylinderDiameter, 2) * cylinderStroke * cyclesPerMin) / 1728;
27  auto const compressionRatio = (airPressure + 14.7) / 14.7;
28 
29  if (pistonType == PneumaticAirRequirement::PistonType::SingleActing) {
30  return {volumeAirIntakeSingle, compressionRatio, volumeAirIntakeSingle * compressionRatio};
31  }
32  auto const volumeAirIntakeDouble = (2 * 1728 * volumeAirIntakeSingle - (0.785 * std::pow(pistonRodDiameter, 2)
33  * cylinderStroke * cyclesPerMin)) / 1728;
34  return {volumeAirIntakeDouble, compressionRatio, volumeAirIntakeDouble * compressionRatio};
35 }

37 ReceiverTank::ReceiverTank(const Method method, const double airDemand, const double allowablePressureDrop,
38  const double atmosphericPressure)
39  : method(method), airDemand(airDemand), allowablePressureDrop(allowablePressureDrop),
40  atmosphericPressure(atmosphericPressure)
41 {
42  if (method != ReceiverTank::Method::General) {
43  throw std::runtime_error("Calculation method must be set to General to use this constructor");
44  }
45 }
46 
47 ReceiverTank::ReceiverTank(Method method, double lengthOfDemandOrDistanceToCompressorRoom, double airFlowRequirementOrSpeedOfAir, double atmosphericPressure,
48  double initialTankPressureOrAirDemand, double finalTankPressureOrAllowablePressureDrop)
49  : method(method), atmosphericPressure(atmosphericPressure),
50  lengthOfDemandOrDistanceToCompressorRoom(lengthOfDemandOrDistanceToCompressorRoom),
51  airFlowRequirementOrSpeedOfAir(airFlowRequirementOrSpeedOfAir),
52  initialTankPressureOrAirDemand(initialTankPressureOrAirDemand),
53  finalTankPressureOrAllowablePressureDrop(finalTankPressureOrAllowablePressureDrop)
54 {
55  if (method != ReceiverTank::Method::DedicatedStorage && method != ReceiverTank::Method::BridgingCompressorReactionDelay) {
56  throw std::runtime_error("Calculation method must be set to DedicatedStorage or BridgingCompressorReactionDelay to use this constructor");
57  }
58 }
59 
60 ReceiverTank::ReceiverTank(Method method, double lengthOfDemand, double airFlowRequirement, double atmosphericPressure,
61  double initialTankPressure, double finalTankPressure, double meteredFlowControl)
62  : method(method), atmosphericPressure(atmosphericPressure), lengthOfDemandOrDistanceToCompressorRoom(lengthOfDemand),
63  airFlowRequirementOrSpeedOfAir(airFlowRequirement), initialTankPressureOrAirDemand(initialTankPressure),
64  finalTankPressureOrAllowablePressureDrop(finalTankPressure), meteredFlowControl(meteredFlowControl)
65 {
66  if (method != ReceiverTank::Method::MeteredStorage) {
67  throw std::runtime_error("Calculation method must be set to MeteredStorage to use this constructor");
68  }
69 }
70 
71 double ReceiverTank::calculateSize() {
72  if (method == ReceiverTank::Method::General) {
73  return airDemand * (atmosphericPressure / allowablePressureDrop) * 7.48;
74  } else if (method == ReceiverTank::Method::DedicatedStorage) {
75  return 7.48 * (lengthOfDemandOrDistanceToCompressorRoom * airFlowRequirementOrSpeedOfAir * atmosphericPressure)
76  / (initialTankPressureOrAirDemand - finalTankPressureOrAllowablePressureDrop);
77  } else if (method == ReceiverTank::Method::MeteredStorage) {
78  return (7.48 * lengthOfDemandOrDistanceToCompressorRoom * (airFlowRequirementOrSpeedOfAir - meteredFlowControl) * atmosphericPressure)
79  / (initialTankPressureOrAirDemand - finalTankPressureOrAllowablePressureDrop);
80  }
81  // method must be BridgingCompressorReactionDelay
82  return (lengthOfDemandOrDistanceToCompressorRoom / airFlowRequirementOrSpeedOfAir) * (initialTankPressureOrAirDemand / 60)
83  * (atmosphericPressure / finalTankPressureOrAllowablePressureDrop) * 7.48;
84 }

86 Compressor::OperatingCost::OperatingCost(double motorBhp, double bhpUnloaded, double annualOperatingHours,
87  double runTimeLoaded, double efficiencyLoaded, double efficiencyUnloaded,
88  double costOfElectricity)
89  : motorBhp(motorBhp), bhpUnloaded(bhpUnloaded), annualOperatingHours(annualOperatingHours),
90  runTimeLoaded(runTimeLoaded), efficiencyLoaded(efficiencyLoaded), efficiencyUnloaded(efficiencyUnloaded),
91  costOfElectricity(costOfElectricity)
92 {}
93 
94 Compressor::OperatingCost::Output Compressor::OperatingCost::calculate() {
95  auto const runTimeUnloaded = 100 - runTimeLoaded;
96  auto const costForLoaded = (motorBhp * 0.746 * annualOperatingHours * costOfElectricity * (runTimeLoaded / 100))
97  / (efficiencyLoaded / 100);
98  auto const costForUnloaded = (motorBhp * 0.746 * annualOperatingHours * costOfElectricity * (bhpUnloaded / 100) * (runTimeUnloaded / 100))
99  / (efficiencyUnloaded / 100);
100  return {runTimeUnloaded, costForLoaded, costForUnloaded, costForLoaded + costForUnloaded};
101 }

103 Compressor::AirSystemCapacity::AirSystemCapacity(Compressor::PipeData pipeLengths,
104  std::vector<double> receivers)
105  : pipeLengths(pipeLengths), receivers(std::move(receivers))
106 {}
107 
108 Compressor::AirSystemCapacity::Output Compressor::AirSystemCapacity::calculate() {
109 
110  auto totalReceiverVol = 0.0;
111  for (auto & gallons : receivers) {
112  gallons /= 7.48;
113  totalReceiverVol += gallons;
114  }
115 
116  return {pipeLengths.totalPipeVolume, receivers, totalReceiverVol,
117  pipeLengths.totalPipeVolume + totalReceiverVol, pipeLengths};
118 }
119 
120 Compressor::AirVelocity::AirVelocity(const double airFlow, const double pipePressure, const double atmosphericPressure)
121  : airFlow(airFlow), pipePressure(pipePressure), atmosphericPressure(atmosphericPressure)
122 {}
123 
124 Compressor::PipeData Compressor::AirVelocity::calculate() {
125  auto const compressedAirVelocity = [this](const double traverseArea) {
126  return (airFlow * atmosphericPressure / (pipePressure + atmosphericPressure)) * (144 / traverseArea) * (1.0 / 60);
127  };
128 
129  return Compressor::PipeData(compressedAirVelocity);
130 }
131 
132 Compressor::PipeSizing::PipeSizing(double airflow, double airlinePressure, double designVelocity,
133  double atmosphericPressure)
134  : airflow(airflow), airlinePressure(airlinePressure), designVelocity(designVelocity),
135  atmosphericPressure(atmosphericPressure)
136 {}
137 
138 Compressor::PipeSizing::Output Compressor::PipeSizing::calculate() {
139  auto const crossSectionalArea = (144 * airflow * atmosphericPressure) / (designVelocity * 60 * (airlinePressure + atmosphericPressure));
140  return {crossSectionalArea, std::sqrt(crossSectionalArea / 0.78)};
141 }
142 
143 Compressor::PneumaticValve::PneumaticValve(const double inletPressure, const double outletPressure)
144  : inletPressure(inletPressure), outletPressure(outletPressure),
145  flowRate(0.6875 * std::sqrt(inletPressure - outletPressure) * std::sqrt(inletPressure + outletPressure)),
146  flowRateKnown(false)
147 {}
148 
149 Compressor::PneumaticValve::PneumaticValve(const double inletPressure, const double outletPressure, const double flowRate)
150  : inletPressure(inletPressure), outletPressure(outletPressure), flowRate(flowRate), flowRateKnown(true)
151 {}
152 
153 double Compressor::PneumaticValve::calculate() {
154  if (!flowRateKnown) {
155  return flowRate;
156  }
157  return flowRate / (0.6875 * std::sqrt(inletPressure - outletPressure) * std::sqrt(inletPressure + outletPressure));
158 }
159 
160 BagMethod::BagMethod(const double operatingTime, const double bagFillTime, const double heightOfBag,
161  const double diameterOfBag, const int numberOfUnits)
162  : operatingTime(operatingTime), bagFillTime(bagFillTime),
163  heightOfBag(heightOfBag), diameterOfBag(diameterOfBag), numberOfUnits(numberOfUnits)
164 {}
165 
166 BagMethod::Output BagMethod::calculate() {
167  auto const flowRate = (0.0273 * std::pow(diameterOfBag, 2) * heightOfBag) / bagFillTime;
168  return {flowRate, (flowRate * operatingTime * numberOfUnits * 60) / 1000 };
169 }
